title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs reach $3.3b in trading volume; BlackRock accounts for $1.3b
description: Today’s stock market scene for Bitcoin and its Spot ETF counterparts is nothing short of a bull run, making a significant mark with a trading volume that brushed past the $3.3 billion mark. Among the frontrunners, BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF is stealing the spotlight, having turned over $1.3 billion in trades alone earlier today. Following […]
